column4: can anyone give me a simple answer how to play music over smb:// directory using any player so far nothing work with amarok , VLC etc
Why don't you browse to the directory? Or, even better... use DAAP.
noobuntu: Well, atleast in rhythmbox, it's an enable-able plugin. In amarok, not so much.
noobuntu: I forgot how I got amarok to do that kind of sharing, but rhythmbox has a plugin called "DAAP music sharing." Enable that, and if the other computer is serving, it should show up shortly.
